title: The vel'koz glitch
body: I've been playing vel'koZ recently and I've found him to be glitchy when I've been versing a yasuo. My tenticles go 3 ways, up left and right, my auto attacks have no animation and it's just glitchy as when I cast my ultimate it stops right away.. it's been going on for a couple of days{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I've had the same glitch, thought it was just me but seems other players can sometimes see it as well. but it messes up my accuracy with his moves and AA's. please fix Riot
